Action: Test Admin Journals and Articles Search Interactions
Go to the DOAJ admin Journals and Articles search at /admin/admin_site_search
Expected Test Results: * All available records are found, and the first page of results is shown

Action: Open and Collapse all the facets on the left
Expected Test Results:
* The facet opens and closes as expected
* Each facet contains a maximum of 10 values relevant to that field

Action: Open one of the facets of your choice
Select one of the values for that facet
Expected Test Results:
* All the results for the selected constraints are found, and the first page is shown
* The filter applied is shown in the facets on the left and above the search results

Action: Go through each sort option in the "sort by" pull-down
In each case, click the "sort by" button to reverse the direction of sort
Expected Test Results: * The current search results are ordered correctly according to the selected sort field and the selected sort direction

Action: Enter a search term in the search box
Expected Test Results:
* All the results for the selected constraints are found, and the first page is shown
* Your search text ramains in the search box

Action: Go through each field constraint under the "search all" pull-down.  You may change your search text if no results are found, to demonstrate that each field works correctly
Expected Test Results:
* If there are search results, the first page is displayed
* If there are no search results, suitable "no results match" text is displayed

Action: Change the page size, using the page-size pull-down
Expected Test Results: * The size of the page of results displays increases appropriately

Action: Click the "Next" button to go to the next page of results
Expected Test Results:
* The next page of results is displayed
* The "First" and "Prev" buttons are activated

Action: Click "Next" again
Click "Prev"
Expected Test Results: * You are navigated one page forward and then one page back in the results

Action: Click "First"
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the first page of the results

Action: Click the black X button to clear all filters
Expected Test Results: * The interface returns to the initial state as per 1.1.1

Action: Test Admin Articles Search Display
Go to the DOAJ admin Journals and Articles search at /admin/admin_site_search
Open the "Journals vs Articles" facet and select "Articles"
Expected Test Results: * Only articles are visible in the search results

Action: Find an article that has a DOI and click on it
Expected Test Results: * You are linked through the DOI to the journal page

Action: Find an article that author has an ORCID iD and click on it
Expected Test Results: * You are linked through the logo to the relevant orcid.org profile website

Action: Click "back" in your browser
Find an article that has a Full text link
Click on the Full text
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the publisher's copy of the full text

Action: Click "back" in your browser
Click "(show/hide)" by an Abstract
Expected Test Results: * The abstract is displayed

Action: Click "("show/hide)" again
Expected Test Results: * The abstract is hidden

Action: Click "Delete this article" at the bottom of a search result
Expected Test Results: * A confirmation box appears

Action: Click "Cancel"
Expected Test Results: * The operation is cancelled, the article is not deleted

Action: Click "Delete this article" at the bottom of a search result
Click "OK"
Expected Test Results:
* A confirmation box appears saying the operation was successful
* The article disappears from the search results

Action: Test Admin Journals Search Display
Go to the DOAJ admin Journals and Articles search at /admin/admin_site_search
Open the "Journals vs Articles" facet and select "Journals"
Expected Test Results: * Only journals are visible in the search results

Action: Open the In DOAJ facet, and select "False"
Expected Test Results:
* None of the journal titles in the search results are links
* "In DOAJ: No" metadata is present

Action: Clear the "In DOAJ?" filter
Select "True" from that facet
Expected Test Results:
* All the journal titles in the search results are links
* "In DOAJ: Yes" metadata is present

Action: Click on the journal title
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the DOAJ ToC page for this journal

Action: Click back (twice) in your browser window to go back to the search results
Click on the "journal" URL for a journal result
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the Journal's home page

Action: Click back in your browser to go back to the search results
Click on a APC URL
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the relevant page on a journal's website

Action: Click back in your browser to go back to the search results
Click "Edit this journal"
Expected Test Results: * A new browser window opens containing the edit form for the journal
